desc: SS Lash Box is a subscription box designed for every lash artist out there! It gives you the chance to try all kinds of different products from the big dog companies to the smaller companies to help find the products you love! It even includes items for the lash artist herself!

layout.text: All your favorite lash products in one box.

Are you a busy lash artist who just hasn't quite found the best products to use? Look no further! SS Lash Box contains products from all the best lash companies, big and small! Say hello to great retention, flawless fanning lashes, hassle free eye pads, and much, MUCH more!
